review.title: “Good place to work. Not a lot of growth opportunity.”
review.pros: Pros – Decent pay and health benefits. You will move up and be appreciated if you are an outstanding employee and can work independently.
review.cons: Cons – Economy is hurting volume of jobs. Management overwhelmed at numerous demands and inability to focus on core competencies.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Identify strengths and weaknesses. Creative management problem solving is critical. Separate each area requiring time and ask: What is vital for financial success? What is taking up your time.
